channel.title: Mahjongg
channel.description:
Does anybody else play this card game? What level do you like the most? Highest score?
I wish there was a free version for Windows but have not found one. I play this on linux all the time.
I like playing on the "cloud" game version. Just my favorite one I don't know why. So far my best time is 4:57 on that one.

item.title: Mahjongg
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:28, topic:432473”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=535184.msg3914590#msg3914590 date=1329054321]

[quote author=Travas link=topic=535184.msg3914387#msg3914387 date=1329024356]

[quote author=Travas link=topic=535184.msg3914352#msg3914352 date=1329023598]

It’s free on windows 7.

Ah another windows fanboi…

oh hey Andrew
[/quote]PRAISE MS
[/quote]-chokes on the biscuit I was eating -

yes

Tbh I’ve never really played this game, and it just seems boring to me

IS IT FUN
[/quote]It actually is fun :o

DID I ASK U

Well ive seen people play it before seemed boring I’ll try it out sometime :o
[/quote]i thought it was pretty gay until i tried it

EDIT: NO IM NOT TALKING ABOUT BUTTSECKS WITH ANOTHER MAN

yep its pretty much normal

So… anyone know where I can play this?
[/quote]http://www.freegames.ws/games/boardgames/mahjong/freemahjong.htm
[/quote]that’s the american version

Why does everyone keep quoting the whole thing? seems pointless…[/quote]>Says quoting something is pointless

quotes anyway

item.title: Mahjongg
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Aff, post:15, topic:432473”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=535184.msg3912793#msg3912793 date=1328913711]

You probably won’t find it, plus it’s a lot more complicated.

really? i think it’s a relatively easy game to understand if you’re not retarded

Real Mahjong? It’s easy to learn, hard to get good at.
[/quote]

not necessarily… it’s a pain when you’re building a good hand and you have a retarded friend who decides to constantly go for junk hands (that pay out like $1 each win), but if you’re playing with people who have an iq >60, then it’s not too hard to be considered ‘good’[/quote]

It’s hard to get good relative to regular Mahjong players.

Read full topic

item.title: Mahjongg
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:13, topic:432473”][quote author=Aff link=topic=535184.msg3912773#msg3912773 date=1328913092]

You probably won’t find it, plus it’s a lot more complicated.

really? i think it’s a relatively easy game to understand if you’re not retarded
[/quote]

Real Mahjong? It’s easy to learn, hard to get good at.[/quote]

not necessarily… it’s a pain when you’re building a good hand and you have a retarded friend who decides to constantly go for junk hands (that pay out like $1 each win), but if you’re playing with people who have an iq >60, then it’s not too hard to be considered ‘good’

Read full topic

item.title: Mahjongg
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:6, topic:432473”][quote author=Aff link=topic=535184.msg3912693#msg3912693 date=1328908533]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=535184.msg3912692#msg3912692 date=1328908491]

It’s free on windows 7.
[/quote]< — xp4life

[hr]

mahjong isn’t a card game?..

ps the western version sucks cock

Had no idea there wasn’t another type sorry. I am referring to the common game found on linux systems.

you need to try the original version - it’s so much better than the crap game you find everywhere
[/quote]mind linking? All I see is the shuffling card game or whatever.[/quote]

probably going to be tough to find one online because no one has the patience to make an AI for the game - get some mahjong tiles and play with people you know in person, it’s fun and great for gambling (i love to profit off of my friends who don’t understand how to make large sums of $ off of their tiles)

Read full topic
